page.title: 08The village shop
page.content:
**{Egton Village Shop}**
The village shop is on the main road in the village. They sell cigarettes, pies, sausage rolls, groceries, newspapers, magazines and wines/spirits.
Tuesdays & Thursdays are the best selling days because the{Bothams}bread is delivered. The shop is open 6 days a week, from 9 to 5.30.
There is a new shopkeeper who hopes they will build up trade as the weeks go by ... the shop has potential for supplying the needs of{Egton.
The shop keeper lives in Fryup Dale, so if we have a bad Winter the assistant will have to come by train. By L. Byron, S. Tindall & T.Roche
